Package edu.uw.pce.advjava.support.exchange

Class FauxMarket

java.lang.Object
edu.uw.pce.advjava.support.exchange.FauxMarket
public class FauxMarket extends Object
Factory for creating a StockExchange for test purposes.
Author:
Russ Moul

      price - the new price

      MarketException - if the ticker symbol is invalid
